endpoints.description: Retrieve a summary of current consumer behavior trends based on region and product category.
Submit a request to analyze market performance and purchasing patterns within a specific region.
Obtain a ranked overview of product categories experiencing the highest demand.
Calculate and provide predictions on seasonal consumer behavior variations for selected items.
Access statistical data regarding product preferences segmented by demographic groups.
Fetch historical trends in consumer behavior for strategic data analysis.
Analyze the success and impact of recent marketing campaigns on product sales.
Provide demand forecasts to align inventory management with market requirements.
Allow the submission of aggregated consumer feedback to identify product improvement opportunities.
Deliver comparative analytics between the client's performance and competitors within the sector.
